summary: Dr. Daniel Ochoa studied dentistry in USMP - Lima Peru, finishing his last semester at an exchange program at Universitat Internacional de Cataluña- Spain. Then pursued advanced program in Oral rehabilitation and Occlusion with Dr. Anibal Alonso in Buenos Aires, Argentina. He underwent further training in different areas of prosthodontics, esthetics and implant dentistry around the world. Then he graduated from the Implant Dentistry 2 year full-time program at New York University having Dr. Sang-Choon Cho, Dr. Stuart Froum and Dr. Takanori Suzuki as mentors. Dr. Ochoa is the first Peruvian to be Diplomate and Fellow of the International Congress of Oral Implantologists, he is also Fellow of the of the International Academy for Dental Facial Esthetics, Member of the American Academy of Cosmetic Dentistry, the American Society of Dental Aesthetics, the International Team for Implantology, the Academy of Osseointegration, Peruvian society of Periodontics and Osseointegration and the Digital Smile Design Masters group. He has lectured internationally in Peru, Bolivia, Venezuela, Colombia, Paraguay, Ecuador, Chile, China, Sudan, Dominican Republic, Mexico, Spain, USA, India, Romania, Poland, India, Egypt, Portugal, Brazil and Japan, published articles on esthetic and implant dentistry and has given numerous hands-on courses on Esthetic Dentistry and Implant Dentistry. He has also been part of the organizing committee of several workshops, lectures and meetings in Peru and internationally. He is a co-owner of Multident Clinics and Infinity Advanced Dental Learning in Lima-Peru. He currently works at his private practice Voorburg-The Netherlands.

treasury_media.title: Transformación de sonrisa con carillas de porcelana - Smile transformation with porcelain veneers
treasury_media.description: ¿Puede una nueva sonrisa cambiarte la vida? En este vídeo vemos la transformación de Alex. Empezamos con un el diagnóstico integral del caso que incluye un set completo de fotografías y vídeo. Luego realizamos su Diseño Digital de Sonrisa. Este diseño se transforma en el Mock-up, la maqueta de prueba de su nueva sonrisa.

profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description: Infinity Institute for Advanced Dental Learning is a recently founded educational institute and clinic with a very prominent future. Already in the third year, the Infinity team has or- ganized lectures, hands-on workshops, life demonstrations and clinical courses with high- ly recognized professors like Dr. Pascal Magne, Dr. Francesco Mangani, Dr. Rafael Decurcio, Dr. Paulo Carvalho, Dr. Rogerio Marcondes, MDT Jhonathan Bocutti, Dr. Leandro Nunez, Dr. Victor Sanchez, Dr. Takanori Suzuki, Mr. Claude Sieber, Dr. Ivan Ronald, Dr. Pablo Santoro, Mr. Livio Yoshinaga, Dr. Florin Cofar, Dr. George Freedman, MDT Ricardo Castor and having participants from Perú, Chile, Argentina, Bolivia, Dominican Republic, Paraguay, Venezuela, Ecuador, Colombia, Brazil, U.S.A, Mexico, Mongolia, Taiwan, Italy, France, China, Hungary and Panama. (http://infinitydental.pe)
profile_positions.title: Co Director

profile_positions.description: Founded by Dr. Jesus Ochoa, Multident Dental Clinics is the largest dental clinic chain in Peru with 40 dental offices offering dental health care to the highest standard. At the present exercises in the Prosthodontic and Implant dentistry departments, and is also part of the board of directors of the clinic. (http://multident.pe)
profile_positions.title: Co Director
